## Introduction
This vignette will demonstrate how to create a leaflet application to display
conservation footprints generated from the optimTFE algorithm.
We will use the solutions output generated from the algorithm, and then additional
spatial data of interest.
There is an option to generate an html document for sharing the map.

```{r Prep, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE)
# Load libraries
library(optimTFE)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.providers)
library(htmltools)
library(htmlwidgets)
```

## Bring in datasets
Map datasets including the solutions output, and additional auxiliary layers such
conservation lands, maps of native or invasive habitat, etc.
We can also include individual species in the map.
```{r Setup datasets, echo=FALSE}

# project folder:
path <- "C:/optimTFE"
# enter the filepath to "solutions.csv" generated from the optimTFE algorithm
solution_file <- read.csv(file.path(path, "data", "leaflet_spatial_data", "example_solution_file.csv"))
# .csv with all solution results; directory set in optimTFE.Rmd example line 60

PU_polygons <- read_sf(file.path(path, "data", "units_spp_suit.gpkg")) #spatial data with PU ids and species scores
selected_sol_index=44 #number of solution to map

native_cons_lands <- list(
  list(name = "Native habitat", filename = file.path(path, "data", "leaflet_spatial_data", "native_habitat.shp"), hidden = T),
  list(name = "Conservation lands", filename = file.path(path, "data", "leaflet_spatial_data", "reserves.shp"), hidden=T))
map_spp <- list(
  list(species = "sp_08", hidden=T),
  list(species = "sp_12", hidden=T),
  list(species = "sp_29", hidden=T)
)

```

```{r Create a conservation footprint map, echo=TRUE, fig.width=8.25, fig.height=6, fig.show='asis'}
# Solution 53 showing conservation footprint
create_solution_interactive_map(solution_file, PU_polygons, selected_sol_index=selected_sol_index)

# Solution 53 showing conservation footprint with auxiliary layers
create_solution_interactive_map(solution_file, PU_polygons, selected_sol_index=selected_sol_index, map_individual_spp = map_spp,  save_HTML_loc = file.path(path, "footprint53.html"))

create_solution_interactive_map(solution_file, PU_polygons, selected_sol_index=selected_sol_index, auxiliaryLayers = native_cons_lands, map_individual_spp = map_spp, save_HTML_loc = file.path(path, "footprint53.html"))
```
